about_the_game:
Take a trip on the lighter fantastic with these upbeat and adventurous tunes! A whimsical dungeon delve, two exciting battles, peaceful town music and a rousing theme round out the collection. These tracks are suitable for traditional JRPG-style games, or any magical fantasy setting.

Features:

- 6 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, themes, and towns!
- 5 ME (Musical Events) to spice up scene transitions or punctuate important moments!
- .ogg, and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free music to use in your RPG Maker MV projects.

Tracklist:

1 - Battle - Errant Knights
2 - Battle - Kings Guard
3 - Dungeon - Underground Explorers
4 - Theme - Shining Castle
5 - Theme - Venture Forth
6 - Town - Hidden Village

ME - Calm
ME - Defeat
ME - Military
ME - Sleep
ME - Victory

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Fantasy Adventure Mini Music Pack

package_groups.name: default

package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - Fantasy Adventure Mini Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: This bite-sized burst of adventure is full of flavor and is the perfect sonic snack when you're hungry for new music. Season your games with new music for battles, towns, dungeons and more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
